recordTypes.name: Licensed Business Fire Safety Complaint
recordTypes.description: Use this link to report possible fire and/or life-safety concerns that may exist at any licensed business establishment within the City of East Providence.  If you feel as if this complaint is immediately dangerous or poses a life-threatening situation, please call 401-537-7331, or dial 9-1-1 for emergency situations.

recordTypes.name: Hot Work Permit
recordTypes.description:
This Hot Work Permit is required for any operation involving open flames or producing heat and/or sparks.  This includes, but is not limited to: Brazing, Cutting, Grinding, Soldering, Thawing Pipe, Torch-Applied Roofing, and Cad Welding.
When filling out this form, please be sure to read each individual safety point and check to affirm you agree to adhere to these points.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use, Dimensional Variance, Modification Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: Planning Board Applications
recordTypes.description: Land Development & Subdivision Applications

recordTypes.name: Sewer Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this application to apply for a Sewer Permit through the City of East Providence's Department of Public Works. 


**ANY WORK IN THE CITY RIGHT OF WAY SHALL BE PERFORMED BY THE CITY.  CONTACT 
401-435-7703 IF WORK IS REQUIRED IN CITY RIGHT OF WAY.

recordTypes.name: Temporary Use Permit / Short Term Rental
recordTypes.description: Apply for a Short Term Rental permit from the City of East Providence

recordTypes.name: Zoning Verification for Detached Accessory Structures Less Than 64sf in Size
recordTypes.description: This application is for those wishing to build a detached accessory structure that is less than 64sf in size.  This application is for, but not limited to, sheds, pergolas, gazebos and detached decks.

recordTypes.name: Block Party Application/ Food Truck Event
Dog License
recordTypes.description:
DOG LICENSE
The dog license year runs annually from April 30th.

recordTypes.name: Business Registration Application
recordTypes.description:
New Business Registration 
You will need this form filled out if your going to have a storefront in the City Of East Providence. 
* If a Business Renewal Registration, Please use the same one you have when you first applied for the registration  via your account. Do not create a new one for each year. If you have question please reach the licensing Clerk Stephanie Melo.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Certificate*
recordTypes.description: Apply here for a Zoning Certificate through the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: NEW Life Safety Inspection
recordTypes.description:
Click here to submit your request for an inspection from the Office of the State Fire Marshal (related to business licenses or construction rough/final) 

Please call 401-431-4614 to schedule residential smoke inspections.

recordTypes.name: Special Event Alcoholic License - Class F
recordTypes.description: Apply for a beer & wine only Class F license.  You must be a qualified non-profit to apply for this type of Alcohol license.

recordTypes.name: Special Event Alcoholic License - Class F 1
recordTypes.description: Apply for a special events full liquor license,  Class F1 .  You must be a qualified non-profit to apply for this type of Alcohol license.

recordTypes.name: Licenses For The City Of East Providence
recordTypes.description:
Apply for your Business licenses (i.e. Victualler,  Sunday/Holiday Sales, Dance/Entertainment, Junkyard, Peddler, Theater, Bowling, Pool Table, Solicitor, Private Detective, etc. from the City of East Providence. 

*Please be advised that all licenses expire annually on November 30th. It is the responsibility of the licensee to submit  for renewal on time. Failure to receive a renewal notice does not excuse the licensee from this obligation- it is the responsibility of the business owner to maintain a current business license at all time.

recordTypes.name: APPLICATION FOR LIQUOR LICENSE
recordTypes.description: Apply for a  Liquor license Class A,B, BV, BVL, C, OR D licenses from the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Special Events One Day Entertainment License
recordTypes.description: Apply for a special events license through the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Donation Drop Box
recordTypes.description: Donation Drop Box in the City of East Providence

recordTypes.name: Road Race
recordTypes.description: Apply for a road race permit from the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit
recordTypes.description:
Apply for a building permit from the City of East Providence, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

*Please allow up to 15 business days for permit approval and issuance.

recordTypes.name: Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU)
recordTypes.description:
Apply for an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) permit from the City of East Providence. 

*Please be aware that ADUs CANNOT be used for Short Term Rental purposes.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description:
Apply for an electrical permit from the City of East Providence, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

*Please allow up to 15 business days for permit approval and issuance.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description:
Apply for a plumbing permit from the City of East Providence, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

*Please allow up to 15 business days for permit approval and issuance.

recordTypes.name: Tent/Event Permit
recordTypes.description: This application must be submitted at least seven days in advance of the event.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description:
Apply for a mechanical permit from the City of East Providence, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

*Please allow up to 15 business days for permit approval and issuance.

recordTypes.name: Moving Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a moving permit from the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the City of East Providence. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: Dumpster Permit
recordTypes.description: A Dumpster permit is ONLY REQUIRED if the dumpster is being install in the STREETS of the City of East Providence.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the City of East Providence.

categories.name: Building Department
City Clerk's Office
categories.content: We welcome your new business to the City of East Providence!

categories.name: Fire Department
categories.content:
Here is a brief description of each link provided:

Licensed Business Fire Safety Complaint - Use this link to report any issues of concern pertaining to fire or life safety at a commercial or business in the City of East Providence.  **Note - if the item of concern is an immediately dangerous or life-threatening please call 9-1-1.  Otherwise, fill out this on-line complaint form and the item of concern will be investigated.

Hot W
